snippet: The Pakistani Taliban claimed responsibility for the blast in Rawalpindi, which came a day after an attack on a military compound in the northwest.
abstract: Suicide bomber strikes near the Pakistani military’s general headquarters in Rawalpindi, killing at least 13 people, including six soldiers.
lead_paragraph: The Pakistani Taliban claimed responsibility for the blast in Rawalpindi, which came a day after an attack on a military compound in the northwest.

headline.main: Suicide Blast in Pakistan Kills at Least 13
headline.print_headline: Suicide Blast in Pakistan Kills at Least 13
